about_the_game: Re-live the mystery and romance of "Detective Rosie Morgan: Murder on the River Thames" with the Official Art Book, displaying the art featured in this mystery romance dating sim visual novel. Enjoy these HD delights that are perfectly sized for wallpaper use!
